reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/purpo.title: Purpose
reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/purpo.summary: Phase 0 is the **mandatory entry point** for any new memecoin project. Before designing tokenomics, writing contracts, or generating a repo, research the market. This phase produces a `MEMECOIN_BRIEF.

reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/trigg.title: Triggers
reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/trigg.summary: Activate Phase 0 when the user says: - "research", "brainstorm", "phase 0", "market analysis" - "I want to launch a memecoin" (implies research needed first) - "new memecoin project" or "memecoin idea

reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/resea.title: Research Modules
reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/resea.summary: Phase 0 consists of 5 research modules executed in order. Each module produces structured output that feeds into the `MEMECOIN_BRIEF.md`.

reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/modul.title: Module R2: Competitor Deep-Dive
reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/modul.summary: **Method:** Analyze 3-5 direct competitors in the user's chosen or emerging narrative.

reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/modul.title: Module R3: Chain Selection (Weighted Scoring)
reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/modul.summary: **Method:** Evaluate 3+ chains using a weighted scoring matrix.

reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/modul.title: Module R5: Utility & Narrative Design
reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/modul.summary: **Method:** Define what makes this token more than "mint & pray".

reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/gono-.title: Go/No-Go Gate
reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/gono-.summary: After completing all 5 modules, evaluate the project viability.

reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/cauti.title: CAUTION Criteria (proceed with documented risk)
reference/phase0researchbrainstorm/cauti.summary: - Chain score 5.0-5.9 - All candidate names memetic_score < 7 but >= 5 - Narrative similar to 3+ existing tokens - Single revenue source

reference/vigilantesecurity/purpose.title: Purpose
reference/vigilantesecurity/purpose.summary: Provide next-generation on-chain protection for fair token launches on Solana. This module addresses the MEV / sniper / bot attack surface that exists during the critical first minutes of liquidity ad

reference/vigilantesecurity/1-jito-aware.title: 1. JITO-Aware Liquidity Addition
reference/vigilantesecurity/1-jito-aware.summary: Use Jito bundles to add liquidity atomically and privately, preventing sniper bots from detecting the LP addition in the public mempool.

reference/vigilantesecurity/2-anti-bot-t.title: 2. Anti-Bot: Time-Weighted Swap Caps
reference/vigilantesecurity/2-anti-bot-t.summary: Enforce maximum swap sizes during the first N minutes after LP addition. This prevents bots from buying massive positions in early blocks.

reference/vigilantesecurity/3-metadata-i.title: 3. Metadata Immutability
reference/vigilantesecurity/3-metadata-i.summary: One-click scripts to permanently lock token metadata and revoke update authority.

reference/vigilantesecurity/4-authority-.summary: Comprehensive post-deploy check that all dangerous authorities are revoked.

reference/vigilantesecurity/5-sandwich-a.title: 5. Sandwich Attack Mitigation
reference/vigilantesecurity/5-sandwich-a.summary: Configuration guidance for protecting users from MEV sandwich attacks.

reference/vigilantesecurity/metadata-loc.title: Metadata Lock Checklist
reference/vigilantesecurity/metadata-loc.summary: | Step | Action | Reversible? | |------|--------|-------------| | 1 | Verify metadata content | Yes | | 2 | Set isMutable = false | NO | | 3 | Revoke update authority | NO | | 4 | Verify on-chain | N/
